name: ORS Social Visit History with Protected Characteristics
description: The visit history for the time period entered at run time as well as the Protected Characteristics for all Prisoners currently in the Establishment VIS0025 - v1 Last Modified: 30/08/2023

dataset.name: All Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE AS VISIT_DATE, DT_ADMISSION.ADMISSION_DATE AS ADMISSION_DATE, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) <= 17 THEN 'Juvenile' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) >= 18 AND TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) <= 20 THEN 'Young Person' ELSE 'Adult' END AS ADULT_YOUNG_PERSON_JUVENILE_37, AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_CODE AS PROFILE_CODE, AT_NATIONALITY.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_DOMSTAT.DESCRIPTION AS DOMESTIC_STATUS, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC.DESCRIPTION, 1, 4) = 'Preg' THEN 'Pregnant' ELSE 'Non Pregnant' END AS MATERNITY_STATUS, AT_RELIGION.DESCRIPTION AS RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_CODE AS RELIGION, AT_OFFENDER_MARITAL_STATUS.PROFILE_CODE AS MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE END || '-' || CASE WHEN AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' WHEN AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DESCRIPTION END AS ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, AT_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.DESCRIPTION AS SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_CODE AS SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_PLACE AS BIRTH_PLACE, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTH_DATE, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) AS AGE_IN_YEARS, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ETHNICITY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_MARITAL_STATUS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS, (SELECT DISTINCT m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(m.MOVEMENT_TIME) AS ADMISSION_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS m, OMS_OWNER.offender_bookings h WHERE h.booking_status = 'O' AND h.active_flag = 'Y' AND m.direction_code = 'IN' /* AND m.Movement_reason_code !='R' */ AND m.Movement_type = 'ADM' AND m.to_agy_loc_id = h.agy_loc_id AND h.offender_book_id = m.offender_book_id GROUP BY m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) DT_ADMISSION, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_NATIONALITY, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_DOMSTAT, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_RELIGION, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = 'ETHNICITY') AND (AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'RELF') AND (AT_OFFENDER_MARITAL_STATUS.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'MARITAL') AND (AT_OFFENDER_MARITAL_STATUS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = ('NAT')) AND (AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE AND AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_CODE) AND (AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = ('NAT')) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_RELIGION.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_CODE) AND (AT_RELIGION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_TYPE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_ADMISSION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_DOMSTAT.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'MARITAL') AND (AT_DOMSTAT.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM.PROFILE_CODE) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'MARITAL') AND (AT_DOMSTAT.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM.PROFILE_TYPE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC.PARENT_DOMAIN (+) = 'HEALTH' AND AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC.PARENT_CODE (+) = 'MATSTAT') AND (AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC.CODE (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'SEXO') AND (AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_TYPE) AND (AT_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_CODE) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, VISIT_DATE, ADMISSION_DATE, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, ADULT_YOUNG_PERSON_JUVENILE_37, PROFILE_CODE, DESCRIPTION, DOMESTIC_STATUS, MATERNITY_STATUS, RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, RELIGION, MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, ETHNIC_CODE, SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_DESCRIPTION, SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE, BIRTH_PLACE, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, AGE_IN_YEARS, LAST_NAME /*, CASE WHEN ALERT_TYPE_CODE = 'LCE' THEN 'Y' END AS V_CARE_EXPERIENCED_ALERT*/ FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: VISIT_BOOKED_WITHIN_6_MO_OF_ADM
field.display: (Placeholder - Visit booked within 6 months of Admission)

dataset.name: Visits Booked
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) <= 17 THEN 'Juvenile' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) >= 18 AND TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) <= 20 THEN 'Young Person' ELSE 'Adult' END AS ADULT_YOUNG_PERSON_JUVENILE_37, AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_CODE AS PROFILE_CODE, AT_NATIONALITY.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_DOMSTAT.DESCRIPTION AS DOMESTIC_STATUS, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC.DESCRIPTION, 1, 4) = 'Preg' THEN 'Pregnant' ELSE 'Non Pregnant' END AS MATERNITY_STATUS, AT_RELIGION.DESCRIPTION AS RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_CODE AS RELIGION, AT_OFFENDER_MARITAL_STATUS.PROFILE_CODE AS MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE END || '-' || CASE WHEN AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' WHEN AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DESCRIPTION END AS ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'W8' THEN 'W3' WHEN AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE = 'O1' THEN 'A4' ELSE AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE END AS ETHNIC_CODE, AT_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.DESCRIPTION AS SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_CODE AS SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_PLACE AS BIRTH_PLACE, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTH_DATE, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE) / 12) AS AGE_IN_YEARS, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_VISIT_ID AS OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE AS VISIT_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'SCH' THEN 'Scheduled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'NORM' THEN 'Normal Completion' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'CANC' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'EXP' THEN 'Expired' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'HMPOP' THEN 'Terminated by Staff' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'OFFEND' THEN 'Prisoner Completed Early' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'VISITOR' THEN 'Visitor Completed Early' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS END AS STATUS_OF_VISIT, AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.DESCRIPTION AS ESTABLISHMENT_NAME_WHERE_VIS35 FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ETHNICITY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_MARITAL_STATUS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_NATIONALITY, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_DOMSTAT, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_RELIGION, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_UAC, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = 'ETHNICITY') AND (AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'RELF') AND (AT_OFFENDER_MARITAL_STATUS.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'MARITAL') AND (AT_OFFENDER_MARITAL_STATUS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = ('NAT')) AND (AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE AND AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_CODE) AND (AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = ('NAT')) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_RELIGION.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_CODE) AND (AT_RELIGION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_RELIGION.PROFILE_TYPE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_UAC.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_DOMSTAT.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'MARITAL') AND (AT_DOMSTAT.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM.PROFILE_CODE) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'MARITAL') AND (AT_DOMSTAT.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_DOM.PROFILE_TYPE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC.PARENT_DOMAIN (+) = 'HEALTH' AND AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC.PARENT_CODE (+) = 'MATSTAT') AND (AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY_DESC.CODE (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_MATERNITY.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = 'SEXO') AND (AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_TYPE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_TYPE) AND (AT_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_SEXUAL_ORIENTATION.PROFILE_CODE) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_) AND CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END = 'Social')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, ADULT_YOUNG_PERSON_JUVENILE_37, PROFILE_CODE, DESCRIPTION, DOMESTIC_STATUS, MATERNITY_STATUS, RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, RELIGION, MARITAL_STATUS_CODE, ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, ETHNIC_CODE, SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_DESCRIPTION, SEXUAL_ORIENTATION_CODE, BIRTH_PLACE, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, AGE_IN_YEARS, LAST_NAME, OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, VISIT_DATE, STATUS_OF_VISIT, ESTABLISHMENT_NAME_WHERE_VIS35 /*, CASE WHEN ALERT_TYPE_CODE = 'LCE' THEN 'Y' END AS V_CARE_EXPERIENCED_ALERT*/ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Disability All
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND (NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'RD', 'PRD') AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.PARENT_CODE = 'DISAB' AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_STATUS = 'ON' AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM' AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.PARENT_CODE = 'DISAB' AND NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'PRD', 'RD')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Care Experienced Alert
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE AS ALERT_CODE, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE') AND AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE = 'LCE')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ALERT_CODE, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Disability with visits
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_VISIT_ID AS OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'SCH' THEN 'Scheduled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'NORM' THEN 'Normal Completion' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'CANC' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'EXP' THEN 'Expired' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'HMPOP' THEN 'Terminated by Staff' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'OFFEND' THEN 'Prisoner Completed Early' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS = 'VISITOR' THEN 'Visitor Completed Early' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_STATUS END AS STATUS_OF_VISIT, AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_HEALTH_PROBLEMS AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_VISITS AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_UAC, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_CODE = AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_UAC.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'RD', 'PRD') AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.PARENT_CODE = 'DISAB' AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND AT_VISIT_HIST_ESTAB.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AND (AT_UAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_HEALTH.PROBLEM_STATUS = 'ON' AND (AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.DOMAIN = 'HEALTH_PBLM' AND AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.PARENT_CODE = 'DISAB' AND NOT AT_HLTH_PRB_DISAB_DSC.CODE IN ('ND', 'NR', 'PRD', 'RD')) AND AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_) AND CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'SCON' THEN 'Social' WHEN AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE = 'OFFI' THEN 'Official' ELSE AT_OFFENDER_HIST_VISITS.VISIT_TYPE END = 'Social')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, OFFENDER_VISIT_ID, STATUS_OF_VISIT, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, ADMISSION_DATE, CASE WHEN ANY_VALUE(VISIT_DATE) IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS V_HAD_VISIT_BOOKED_IN_TIME_FRAME, 'Placeholder value' AS VISIT_BOOKED_WITHIN_6_MO_OF_ADM FROM dataset_ GROUP BY OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, ADMISSION_DATE)

field.name: VISIT_BOOKED_WITHIN_6_MO_OF_ADM
field.display: Visit booked within 6 months of Admission

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, VISIT_DATE, STATUS_OF_VISIT FROM dataset_ WHERE (STATUS_OF_VISIT IN ('Normal Completion')) GROUP BY OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, VISIT_DATE, STATUS_OF_VISIT)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (VISITS_BOOKED_STATUS_OF_VISIT IN ('Normal Completion')))
